concept.title: Users
concept.shortdesc: User management allows you to say who can use the system to do what, and who can access what data.

conbody.p: user management is organized around user roles and user authorizations. Your user role defines what parts of the you can use, and user authorizations are combined with data visibilities in access policies to specify how users are allowed to interact with data.
Most user information is set and modified on the Manage Users page. The exception is user authorizations, which are defined as part of system configuration.
